src:
Đokovićeva 12. sezona sa 50 i više pobeda
Ispred njega su još samo Konors i Federer

01 Nov 2019

U modernom sportu kateorija rekorda je, zahvaljujući pre svega modernim tehnologijama koje omogućavaju ozbiljnu analitiku, znatno proširena. Kategorija uspeha, to jest rekorra sada ima "ne zna im se broj".
Tako je sinoć Novak Đoković zabeležio po 12. put u karijeri 50 ili više pobeda jednoj sezoni. Po ATP on je time uspeo da stigne Ivana Lendla kojeg je nedavno preskočio na trećem mestu u kategoriji broja sedmica provedenih na vrhu ATP liste.
Inače, ispred Đokovića i Lendla su još samo legendarni Džimi Konors koji je zabeležio 50 i više trijumfa u 14 takmičarskih godina, dok je sa 16 nepriskosnoven, a ko drugi nego Rodžer Federer.

(Foto: Reuters)
text:
Djokovic's 12th season with 50 or more wins
Only Konors and Federer are ahead of him

01 Nov 2019

In modern sports, the record category is, thanks primarily to modern technologies that enable serious analytics, to be expanded significantly. The success category, that is, the record, now has "they don't know the number."
So last night, Novak Djokovic recorded his 12th career win of 50 or more wins in a single season. According to ATP, he managed to get Ivan Lendl, who recently jumped to third place in the number of weeks spent at the top of the ATP list.
Otherwise, ahead of Djokovic and Lendl are only the legendary Jimmy Connors, who has recorded 50 or more triumphs in 14 competitive years, with 16 being undefeated and none other than Roger Federer.

(Photo by Reuters)
